i18n.title: Random Number Generation in Go
i18n.description: This lab aims to test your ability to generate random numbers using the math/rand package in Golang.

meta.title: Generating Random Numbers in Go | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to generate random integers and floats within a specified range using the math/rand package in Golang. Produce varying sequences of numbers by changing the seed.
meta.keywords: Golang, Random Numbers, Math/Rand, Programming Tutorials, Pseudorandom Number Generation

verify.name: Verify Random Numbers Generation
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: Go语言中的随机数生成
i18n.description: 本实验旨在测试你使用Go语言的math/rand包生成随机数的能力。

meta.title: Go语言中生成随机数 | 编程教程
meta.description: 学习如何使用Go语言的math/rand包在指定范围内生成随机整数和浮点数。通过更改种子生成不同的数字序列。
meta.keywords: Go语言, 随机数, Math/Rand, 编程教程, 伪随机数生成

verify.name: 验证随机数生成
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
